options.text: Default value of text input option

targets.rawSql:
SELECT UNIX_TIMESTAMP(StartDate)*1000 as StartDate, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(EndDate)*1000 as EndDate, 'Driving' as Action,
    TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, StartDate, EndDate) as MinuteDiff,
    Start_address, End_address,
    TP1.odometer as odometer,
    consumption_kWh as kWh,
    km_diff, (StartRange - EndRange) as RangeDiff,
    TP1.battery_level as SOC, TP1.battery_level-TP2.battery_level as SOC_Diff,
    outside_temp_avg,
    null as distance,
    trip.StartPosId as startposid, trip.EndPosId as endposid,
    TP1.lat as StartLat,TP1.lng as StartLng,
    null as cost, null as csid, null as currency,
    TP2.odometer as odometerEnd,
    speed_max, null as max_charger_power,
    null as sleephours
from trip
	left outer join pos as TP1 on trip.StartPosId = TP1.id
    left outer Join pos as TP2 on trip.EndPosId = TP2.id
WHERE '1' in ($ACTION) and
  $__timeFilter(trip.StartDate) and km_diff < 1000 and trip.CarID = $Car and TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, StartDate, EndDate) > 0
  and (Start_address like '%$Textfilter%' or End_address like '%$Textfilter%')

union
SELECT UNIX_TIMESTAMP(chargingstate.StartDate)*1000 as StartDate, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(chargingstate.EndDate)*1000 as EndDate,'Charging' as Action,
    TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, chargingstate.StartDate, chargingstate.EndDate) as MinuteDiff,
    pos.address as Start_address, '' as End_address, 
    pos.odometer as odometer,
    chargingstate.charge_energy_added as kWh, 
    null as km_diff,
    charging_End.ideal_battery_range_km - charging.ideal_battery_range_km as RangeDiff, 
    charging.battery_level as SOC, charging_End.battery_level - charging.battery_level as SOC_Diff,
    null as outside_temp_avg,
    null as distance,
    null as startposid, null as endposid,
    pos.lat as StartLat,pos.lng as StartLng,
    cost_total as cost, chargingstate.id as csid, cost_currency as currency,
    null as odometerEnd,
    null as speed_max, max_charger_power,
    null as sleephours
FROM charging inner JOIN chargingstate ON charging.id = chargingstate.StartChargingID INNER JOIN
    pos ON chargingstate.pos = pos.id
    LEFT OUTER JOIN
    charging AS charging_End ON chargingstate.EndChargingID = charging_End.id
    join cars on cars.id = chargingstate.carid
WHERE '2' in ($ACTION) and 
$__timeFilter(chargingstate.StartDate) and chargingstate.CarID = $Car and TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, StartDate, EndDate) > 0
and (pos.address like '%$Textfilter%')
  
union
SELECT
    UNIX_TIMESTAMP(T1.EndDate) * 1000 as StartDate, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(T2.StartDate) * 1000 as EndDate,'Parking' as Action,
    TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, T1.EndDate, T2.StartDate) as MinuteDiff,
    TP1.address as Start_address, '' as End_address,
    TP1.odometer as odometer,
    (TP1.ideal_battery_range_km - (TP2.ideal_battery_range_km + (TP2.odometer - TP1.odometer))) * wh_tr as kWh, null as km_diff,
    (TP1.ideal_battery_range_km - (TP2.ideal_battery_range_km + (TP2.odometer - TP1.odometer))) as RangeDiff,
    TP1.battery_level as SOC, TP2.battery_level-TP1.battery_level as SOC_Diff,
    null as outside_temp_avg,
    null as distance,
    null as startposid, null as endposid,
    TP1.lat as StartLat,TP1.lng as StartLng,
    null as cost, null as csid, null as currency,
    null as odometerEnd,
    null as speed_max, null as max_charger_power,
    (
        SELECT
            sum(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, StartDate, EndDate) / 60)
        FROM
            state
        where
            (state = 'asleep' or state = 'offline')
            and StartDate >= T1.EndDate
            and EndDate <= T2.StartDate
            and EndDate > StartDate
            and carid=$Car 
    ) as sleephours
FROM
    drivestate as T1
    left outer join drivestate as T2 on T1.id + 1 = T2.id
    left outer Join pos as TP1 on T1.EndPos = TP1.id
    left outer join pos as TP2 on T2.StartPos = TP2.id
    JOIN cars ON cars.id = T2.CarID
WHERE '3' in ($ACTION) and
    $__timeFilter(T1.EndDate) and T1.carid=$Car 
    and TP1.ideal_battery_range_km - TP2.ideal_battery_range_km >= 0
    and TP2.carid=$Car 
    and TP1.carid=$Car 
    and TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, T1.EndDate, T2.StartDate) > 0
    and (TP1.address like '%$Textfilter%')
union

SELECT
    UNIX_TIMESTAMP(T2.StartDate) * 1000 - 1 as StartDate, null as EndDate, 'Missing' as Action,
    null as MinuteDiff,
    TP1.address as Start_address, TP2.address as End_address,
    TP1.odometer as odometer,
    null as kWh, TP2.odometer - TP1.odometer as km_diff,
    null as RangeDiff,
    null as SOC, null as SOC_Diff,
    null as outside_temp_avg,
    TP2.odometer - TP1.odometer as distance,
    null as startposid, null as endposid,
    null as StartLat,null as StartLng,
    null as cost, null as csid, null as currency,
    null as odometerEnd,
    null as speed_max, null as max_charger_power,
    null as sleephours
FROM
    drivestate as T1
    left outer join drivestate as T2 on T1.id + 1 = T2.id
    left outer Join pos as TP1 on T1.EndPos = TP1.id
    left outer join pos as TP2 on T2.StartPos = TP2.id
WHERE '4' in ($ACTION) and
    $__timeFilter(T1.EndDate) and T1.carid=$Car 
    and TP2.carid=$Car 
    and TP1.carid=$Car 
    and TP2.odometer - TP1.odometer > 0.5
    and (TP1.address like '%$Textfilter%')

UNION
    
SELECT UNIX_TIMESTAMP(StartDate)*1000 as StartDate, null as EndDate, 'Update' as Action,
    null as MinuteDiff,
    version as Start_address, null End_address,
    null as odometer,
    null as kWh,
    null as km_diff, null as RangeDiff,
    null as SOC, null as SOC_Diff,
    null as outside_temp_avg,
    null as distance,
    null as startposid, null as endposid,
    null as StartLat,null as StartLng,
    null as cost, null as csid, null as currency,
    null as odometerEnd,
    null as speed_max, null as max_charger_power,
    null as sleephours
from car_version
WHERE '5' in ($ACTION) and
  $__timeFilter(StartDate) and CarID = $Car 
    
order by StartDate desc

list.definition: select display_name as __text, id as __value from cars where length(vin) > 5 order by display_name
list.name: Car
list.query: select display_name as __text, id as __value from cars where length(vin) > 5 order by display_name

list.definition:
select 'Driving' as __text, 1 as __value
union select 'Charging' as __text, 2 as __value
union select 'Parking' as __text, 3 as __value
union select 'Missing' as __text, 4 as __value
union select 'Update' as __text, 5 as __value
list.label: Action
list.name: ACTION
list.query:
select 'Driving' as __text, 1 as __value
union select 'Charging' as __text, 2 as __value
union select 'Parking' as __text, 3 as __value
union select 'Missing' as __text, 4 as __value
union select 'Update' as __text, 5 as __value
